sentences.english: Auto-save of the article in a draft status.
sentences.chinese: 自动保存在草稿状态的文章。

sentences.english: He had painfully drawn up a first draft.
sentences.chinese: 他费力地写出第一份草稿。

sentences.english: Leave it on your desk or in your "Drafts" folder until the next morning.
sentences.chinese: 把他们留在桌上或草稿箱里，待第二天早上再来处置。

sentences.english: Have you seen the artwork roughs for the new book?
sentences.chinese: 你看到那本新书的插图草稿了吗？

sentences.english: There is no essential difference between the two drafts.
sentences.chinese: 两份草稿没有本质上的不同。

sentences.english: The book is a shapeless mass of contradictory rough drafts.
sentences.chinese: 那本书是一堆自相矛盾的草稿的汇编。

sentences.english: In case of emergency, each student has a single one day extension on a draft or revision that she or he can take.
sentences.chinese: 有突发情况时，每人只能延期一天提交草稿或修改稿。

sentences.english: His tower can be seen in the background of this early sketch.
sentences.chinese: 从这幅前期草稿的背景中可以看到他的宝塔。

sentences.english: The exported document displays in the draft document list.
sentences.chinese: 导出的文档显示在草稿文档列表中。

sentences.english: No. Candidates may use only their question book for calculations and scratch work.
sentences.chinese: 不行，考生只能使用他们的考卷来做为草稿纸计算。

sentences.english: Write it out in rough and then copy it.
We deliver a rough draft of all 5 animations with ideas of background- and hero-style.
sentences.chinese: 我们提供的背景和英雄式的想法了全部5个动画草稿。

sentences.english: Unable to withstand my importunity he would make out drafts for me to copy.
sentences.chinese: 他受不了我的纠缠，就先拟出草稿叫我去抄。

sentences.english: And a lot of idle resources, such as notebooks, such as draft paper .
sentences.chinese: 而闲置的资源也很多，比如草稿纸笔记本等。

sentences.english: Damn, I am good at telling lies!
sentences.chinese: 妈的，我只是撒谎不打草稿。

sentences.english: Preparing a lecture or drafting a textbook chapter reveals holes in your understanding.
sentences.chinese: 备一堂课，写一章草稿，它们都能暴露你思想的漏洞。

definition: rough sketch (of a painting)/(of an official) to approve a document by signing it
to transcribe/to make a fair copy
to make a draft/to draft (a document)
book/notebook/Japanese-style self-published comic (esp. an erotic one), aka "dōjinshi"/CL:本[ben3]/edition
to annotate/to add marginal comments on/criticism/marginalia
